## Timeblocks

### v1 (18:57)

(Didn’t really make a timeblock for today)

```plain text
9:30 | Woke up
9:30 - 10:00 | Morning Routine
10:00 - 11:30 | Dialect
11:30 - 13:30 | Out with family
13:30 - 18:30 | Out with friends
18:30 - 18:45 | ProjectEuler
18:45 - 19:00 | Dinner
19:00 - 19:20 | Shower
19:20 - 20:10 | VPCC stuff
20:10 - 22:20 | Badminton with friends
22:20 | Sleep
```

### v2 (22:29)

Didn’t put myself in an optimal position to get VPCC work done (should have went to my desk; instead just sat on bed and read instead)

```plain text
9:30 | Woke up
9:30 - 10:00 | Morning Routine
10:00 - 11:30 | Dialect
11:30 - 13:30 | Out with family
13:30 - 18:30 | Out with friends
18:30 - 18:45 | ProjectEuler
18:45 - 19:00 | Dinner
19:00 - 19:20 | Shower
19:20 - 20:10 | Reading
20:10 - 22:20 | Badminton with friends
22:20 - 22:30 | Chat
22:30 - 22:40 | Create timeblock
23:40 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15 | Sleep
```

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:15 | Fill out Sleep Log; Brush Teeth; Eat Breakfast
```

### Afternoon Routine

```plain text
13:00 - 13:30 | Walk/Office Hours
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:25 | Check email; Create timeblock for next day
22:25 - 22:30 | Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Fill out Sleep Log; Bedtime
```

## Generic Timeblock

These entries are intentionally vague (the specifics will be listed in the specific timeblocks above), but the general order of tasks/priority of tasks is outlined in the following generic timeblock:

```plain text
7:00 - 7:15   | Morning Routine
7:15 - 13:00  | Dialect work (specific activities listed in specific timeblock above)
13:00 - 13:30 | Walk/Office Hours
13:30 - 19:15 | Precommit work (specific activities listed in specific timeblock above)
19:15 - 20:40 | Side projects
20:40 - 22:00 | Buffer time (accounts for leisure time)
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```
